skin_enable.description: enable bit of skin color based noise reduction
skin_enable.additional_notes: if face_enable = 1 and skin_enable = 1, skin color noise reduction is applied on face regions; if face_enable = 0 and skin_enable=1, skin color noise reduction is applied on both face regions and non-face regions

chroma_gradient_enable.description: enable bit of chroma gradient statistics

radial_anchor_tab.description: anchor table (distance percentage)for radius based noise reduction

face_enable.description: enable bit of face guided skin color based noise reduction
face_enable.additional_notes: if face_enable = 1 and skin_enable = 1, skin color noise reduction is applied on face regions; if face_enable = 0 and skin_enable=1, skin color noise reduction is applied on both face regions and non-face regions

radial_enable.description: enable bit of radial distance based sharpening

contrast_enable.description: enable bit of contrast based sharpening.

layer_1_activity_normalization_lut_tab.description: level-based normalization LUT to calculate normalized activity

layer_1_weight_modulation_lut_tab.description: normalized activity-based LUT to control the slope(output/input) when sharpened value magnitude is less than the soft threshold

layer_1_soft_threshold_lut_tab.description: level-based soft-thresholding LUT to determine the final sharpened value

layer_1_gain_positive_lut_tab.description: level-based sharpening gain LUT for positive halos

layer_1_gain_negative_lut_tab.description: level-based sharpening gain LUT for negative halos

layer_1_gamma_corrected_luma_target.description: luma target after gamma to control level-based sharpening.

layer_1_clamp_ul.description: Manual fixed positive clamping level sharpening

layer_1_clamp_ll.description: Manual fixed negative clamping level sharpening

layer_1_norm_scale.description: scale factor of 5x5 band-pass filter output (activity)

layer_1_activity_clamp_threshold.description: static clamp of 5x5 band-pass filter output (activity)

layer_1_l2_norm_en.description: enable L2 norm for 5x5 band-pass filter output (activity). 0: L1 norm (absolute value), 1: L2 norm (squared value)

layer_1_median_blend_lower_offset.description: lower offset of median blend. Has to be smaller than upper offset.

layer_2_hpf_symmetric_coeff_tab.description: 2nd layer 9x9 sharpening coefficients (one-eighth coefficients, every other pixels and lines are skipped)

layer_2_lpf_symmetric_coeff_tab.description: 2nd layer 9x9 low-pass filter coefficients (one-eighth coefficients, every other pixels and lines are skipped)

layer_2_activity_normalization_lut_tab.description: level-based normalization LUT to calculate normalized activity

layer_2_weight_modulation_lut_tab.description: normalized activity-based LUT to control the slope(output/input) when sharpened value magnitude is less than the soft threshold

layer_2_soft_threshold_lut_tab.description: level-based soft-thresholding LUT to determine the final sharpened value

layer_2_gain_positive_lut_tab.description: level-based sharpening gain LUT for positive halos

layer_2_gain_negative_lut_tab.description: level-based sharpening gain LUT for negative halos

layer_2_clamp_ll.description: Manual fixed negative clamping level sharpening

layer_2_norm_scale.description: scale factor of 5x5 band-pass filter output (activity)

layer_2_activity_clamp_threshold.description: static clamp of 5x5 band-pass filter output (activity)

layer_2_l2_norm_en.description: enable L2 norm for 5x5 band-pass filter output (activity).0: L1 norm (absolute value), 1: L2 norm (squared value)

radial_activity_adj_tab.description: correction factor for activity based on radial distance

radial_gain_adj_tab.description: correction factor for gain based on radial distance

skin_hue_min.description: Min hue value for skin detection. Instead of negative (Cb/Cr), absolute value |Cb/Cr| is used in HW

skin_hue_max.description: Max hue value for skin detection. Instead of negative (Cb/Cr), absolute value |Cb/Cr| is used in HW

skin_saturation_min_ymax.description: Minimum saturation value for skin when Y=Y_max.

skin_saturation_max_ymax.description: Maximum saturation value for skin when Y=Y_max.

skin_saturation_min_ymin.description: Minimum saturation value for skin when Y=Y_min.

skin_saturation_max_ymin.description: Maximum saturation value for skin when Y=Y_min.

skin_boundary_probability.description: Denoting the skin-tone probability at the boundary of skin-tone range.

skin_percent.description: The portion of skin_tone region with skin-tone probability 1.

flat_thresold.description: Apply edge smoothing only when maximum AAD (average absolute difference) is larger or equal to FlatThreshold.

max_smoothing_clamp.description: edge smoothing value change is clamped by max_smoothing_clamp.

smoothing_strength.description: Blending factor between original pixel and edge smoothed pixel.

gain_contrast_negative_tab.description: Contrast-based negative halo sharpening gain LUT

gain_chroma_positive_tab.description: Chroma gradient-based positive halo sharpening gain

gain_chroma_negative_tab.description: Chroma gradient-based negative halo sharpening gain LUT

face_boundary.description: full skin detection is applied when radius less-or-equal to face_boundary * face_radius(from face detection).

face_transition.description: No skin detection is applied when radius less-or-equal to face_transition * face_radius(from face detection).

layer_1_activity_normalization_lut_tab.description: level-based normalization LUT to calculate normalized activity
